docs.snippet: John Lewis [JLP.UL] [JLPLC.UL], Britain's biggest department store chain, said sales in the week before Christmas soared 36 percent as shoppers splurged on household items and the figures were boosted by two extra trading days compared to the same...
docs.lead_paragraph: John Lewis [JLP.UL] [JLPLC.UL], Britain's biggest department store chain, said sales in the week before Christmas soared 36 percent as shoppers splurged on household items and the figures were boosted by two extra trading days compared to the same period in 2015.

headline.main: John Lewis Posts Strong Sales Growth in Pre-Christmas Week
headline.print_headline: John Lewis Posts Strong Sales Growth in Pre-Christmas Week

docs.snippet: In a story Jan. 4 about, The Associated Press reported erroneously that Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac will increased the limit of the mortgages they will buy from lenders next year. The limit was increased on Jan. 1....
docs.lead_paragraph: In a story Jan. 4 about, The Associated Press reported erroneously that Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac will increased the limit of the mortgages they will buy from lenders next year. The limit was increased on Jan. 1.
